name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojosAnnotatedWithPodamConstructor

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableNoHierarchicalAnnotatedPojo

Then the object ImmutableNoHierarchicalPojo [intField=927675783, dateCreated=java.util.GregorianCalendar[time=1508500955236,areFieldsSet=true,areAllFieldsSet=true,lenient=true,zone=sun.util.calendar.ZoneInfo[id="Asia/Kolkata",offset=19800000,dstSavings=0,useDaylight=false,transitions=6,lastRule=null],firstDayOfWeek=1782087017,minimalDaysInFirstWeek=1575210933,ERA=1,YEAR=2017,MONTH=9,WEEK_OF_YEAR=42,WEEK_OF_MONTH=3,DAY_OF_MONTH=20,DAY_OF_YEAR=293,DAY_OF_WEEK=6,DAY_OF_WEEK_IN_MONTH=3,AM_PM=1,HOUR=5,HOUR_OF_DAY=17,MINUTE=32,SECOND=35,MILLISECOND=236,ZONE_OFFSET=19800000,DST_OFFSET=0], longArray=[44322614288894, 44322614352592, 44322614408576, 44322614465223, 44322614520390]] should not be null
Then the int field should not be zero

Then the pojo java.util.GregorianCalendar[time=1508500955236,areFieldsSet=true,areAllFieldsSet=true,lenient=true,zone=sun.util.calendar.ZoneInfo[id="Asia/Kolkata",offset=19800000,dstSavings=0,useDaylight=false,transitions=6,lastRule=null],firstDayOfWeek=1782087017,minimalDaysInFirstWeek=1575210933,ERA=1,YEAR=2017,MONTH=9,WEEK_OF_YEAR=42,WEEK_OF_MONTH=3,DAY_OF_MONTH=20,DAY_OF_YEAR=293,DAY_OF_WEEK=6,DAY_OF_WEEK_IN_MONTH=3,AM_PM=1,HOUR=5,HOUR_OF_DAY=17,MINUTE=32,SECOND=35,MILLISECOND=236,ZONE_OFFSET=19800000,DST_OFFSET=0] must be of the type class java.util.GregorianCalendar
Then the pojo Fri Oct 20 17:32:35 IST 2017 must be of the type class java.util.Date
Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type class java.lang.Long
The long value cannot be zero

title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs annotated with @PodamConstructor
